name: Solix
overview: A puzzle game created by Oliver Malms and published in both 64'er 1991/08 and 64'er 1999/01. You must clear the game board by jumping over a stone with a neighboring stone to remove it. The goal is to remove as many stones as possible. Now on Solix, the shape of the score changes in each level and a certain number (bound) of stones must be cleared in each level. There are also special items. Solving the level quickly gives a time bonus, The game cursor is moved with the joystick in port 2. To skip a levels, press fire and steer up or down for different levels.
